page.description: Tests whether a dot variable has a specified property
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = prop_valid(P dot_variable ,C property [,L recursive ])

argument.name: dot_variable
argument.description: The name of a dot variable.

argument.name: property
argument.description: The name of an element of the dot variable.

argument.name: recursive
argument.description:
Optional. Default
.T. = Looks inside of dot variables inside this dot variable.
.F. = Does not look inside of dot variables inside this dot variable.

page.discussion: PROP_VALID() determines whether Property exists within Dot_Variable.
page.example: dim dt as P dim dt.a as C dim dt.b as N prop_valid(dt, "b", .T.) ?.T. prop_valid(dt, "c", .T.) ? .F.
